title: Recorded telephone service messages
context: State a pre-recorded message that the dialed number has been disconnected.

content.bestLine: The number you have dialed is no longer in service.

neutral.text: The number you called is disconnected.
We're sorry, this number is out of service.
The phone number you dialed is no longer active.
The number is not in use.
The number you have reached is not in service.

formal.text: The number you have dialed is no longer in service.
We regret to inform you that this number is disconnected.
This telephone number is not available for use.
The line you are trying to reach is out of service.
We apologize, but the number you called is no longer active.
The number you have called is not currently in use.

patterns.template: We're sorry, [options] number is out of service.
patterns.meaning: The number is no longer in use.

lines.speaker: Automated Voice
lines.text: The number you have dialed is no longer in service.

lines.speaker: Automated Voice
lines.text: The number you have dialed is no longer in service.
